com.asgoc.common.code.json

Class ConcreteJSONManipulator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.asgoc.common.code.json.ConcreteJSONManipulator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    JSONManipulator

    class ConcreteJSONManipulator
extends java.lang.Object
implements JSONManipulator
    Class that serves as a wrapper for the JSON creation and manipulation library. The class is an implementation of the JSONManipulaotr interface. It provides an interface only to a small portion of the library that is required. Most of the methods return the instance of the JSONManipulator used to invoke them to allow nesting of calls.
    Author:
    Kaartic Sivaraam

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ConcreteJSONManipulator()
      Creates an instance of the JSONManipulator by creating a JSONObject with it's default constructor.
      ConcreteJSONManipulator(java.lang.Object obj)
      Creates an instance of the ConcreteJSONManipulator by initialising the JSONObject field with a JSON object representation of the provided Object.
      ConcreteJSONManipulator(java.lang.String sourceJSON)
      Creates an instance of the ConcreteJSONManipulator by initialising the JSONObject field with a JSON object representation of the provided String

      • ConcreteJSONManipulator

        public ConcreteJSONManipulator(java.lang.Object obj)
        Creates an instance of the ConcreteJSONManipulator by initialising the JSONObject field with a JSON object representation of the provided Object. The keys and values are found using bean getters.
        Parameters:
        obj - The string using which the JSONObject is initialised.

      • appendArray

        public ConcreteJSONManipulator appendArray(java.lang.String key,
                                           java.util.Collection<?> arrayCollection)
        Appends (key,array of JSON values) to the JSONObject field. The array of JSON values is constructed from the Collection.
        Specified by:
        appendArray in interface JSONManipulator

      • appendMap

        public ConcreteJSONManipulator appendMap(java.lang.String key,
                                         java.util.Map<?,?> keyValues)
        Appends (key, JSONObject) to the JSONObject field. The JSONObject is constructed from the Map. The key is associated with the constructed JSONObject.
        Specified by:
        appendMap in interface JSONManipulator
        Parameters:
        key - key with which the provided Map (that would be converted to a JSONObject) would be associated.
        keyValues - Map of (key, value) pairs that constitute the value of the provided key. The Map would be converted to a JSONObject.
        Returns:
        The handle of the ConcreteJSONManipulator to allow nested operations.
